name: Infant Mortality
author: Lisa DeBruine
description: Infant mortality by country and year from the World Health Organisation.

variableMeasured.name: Year
variableMeasured.description: The year the statistic was calculated for (yyyy)

variableMeasured.name: Infant mortality rate (probability of dying between birth and age 1 per 1000 live births)
variableMeasured.description: Infant mortality rate (the probability of dying between birth and age 1 per 1000 live births) and confidence interval in the format "rate [lowCI-highCI]"
